properties.entry: SELECT M_CODE , M_NAME , M_ID , M_PWD , M_PHONE , M_BIRTH , M_GENDER , M_ADDRESS , M_SUBADDRESS , M_POSTCODE , M_EMAIL , M_ENROLLDATE , M_INTRODUCER , M_STATUS , M_QUITREASON , M_QUITDATE , M_AD , M_BLACKDATE , M_BLACKREASON , M_POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ID = ? AND M_PWD = ? AND (M_STATUS = 'Y' OR M_STATUS = 'A')
